title: The Ingredients of Food Inflation
sub_head: How shoppers can navigate grocery aisles during the highest inflation in decades
body:
You have probably noticed chicken breasts, ground beef and cream cheese getting more expensive. They are likely to stay that way for the foreseeable future, supermarket executives say.
Food companies are raising prices on everything from snacks to mustard, while retailers pass more of these increases down to shoppers. As grocery prices keep going up, hereâ€™s the latest on what food inflation means for you.
